name: Jinkies!
description:
Jinkies is a small virtual pet game.

Adopt your very own Jinkie and take care of it. Make sure it stays happy and doesn't get hungry!

Music by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/)

My Twitter: @fakefrogsonly

-----

I made this over a weekend for a game jam last year. It's far from perfect and the concept has a lot of ways that it could be expanded upon. However, rather than let it sit on my hard drive forever I figured I should put it out there for anyone who may be interested. Thanks for playing!
